page.title: 06Education and Health
page.content:
Education
School age children now have to attend Swaffham Bulbeck or Bottisham primary schools. The secondary school for the area is Bottisham Village College. Lode village primary school was closed this year, as not enough children attended. Most primary age children from the fen are driven to school by their parents, or taken to a bus collection point in the village. Parents seem generally satisfied with the school standards and facilities.
Health
Medical services are available from Bottisham surgery. Hospital facilities are available in Newmarket and Cambridge, but delays of many months are common for chronic cases.
